entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:44 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 9:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -22.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -30
Dewpoint: -26.6°C
Wind: WNW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of light snow late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 23 February 2023
